#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stack>
#include<string>
#include<queue>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<vector>
#include<cmath>
#define pb push_back
#define big long long
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define RFOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i>=b;i--)
#define vi vector<int>
#define vb vector<big>
using namespace std;
int main() {
	big l,t,n,i,j,k,temp,c,*arr,sum,f;
	double x1=0,x2,y1,y2,x3,y3,m1,m2,m3;
	int h,num=0,prev;
	vb v,line;
	string s;
    cin>>n;
    j=0;
    while(n!=0)
    {
        j++;
        v.clear();
        sum=0;
        FOR(i,1,n)
        {
            cin>>temp;
            v.pb(temp);
            sum+=temp;
        }
        f=sum/n;
        sum=0;
        FOR(i,0,n-1)
            sum+=abs(v[i]-f);
        cout<<"Set #"<<j<<endl;
        cout<<"The minimum number of moves is "<<sum/2<<"."<<endl;
        cout<<endl;
        cin>>n;
    }
	return 0;
}
